name: AnimatedIcon
desc: Shows an animated icon at a given animation [progress].

fields.name: progress
fields.desc: The animation progress for the animated icon.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color to use when drawing the icon.

fields.name: size
fields.desc: The size of the icon in logical pixels.

fields.name: icon
fields.desc: The icon to display. Available icons are listed in [AnimatedIcons].

fields.name: textDirection
fields.desc: The text direction to use for rendering the icon.
